import {useState} from 'react' import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink} from 'reactstrap' import LoginModal from './LoginModal' import SignUpModal from './SignUpModal' const NavigationBar = ({logOut}) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen) const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState(!!localStorage.getItem('token')) const handleLogout = (e) => { logOut(e) setCurrentUser(!currentUser) } return (
Project App
{currentUser ? <> Trivias Log Out : <> }
) } export default NavigationBar
